commonMeals.name: Greek yogurt with honey and nuts
commonMeals.portionGuidance: 3/4 cup yogurt + 1 tsp honey + 1 tbsp nuts

commonMeals.name: Egg and spinach frittata
commonMeals.portionGuidance: 2 eggs + 1 cup spinach + 1 tsp olive oil

commonMeals.name: Mediterranean salad with chickpeas
commonMeals.portionGuidance: 2 cups salad + 3/4 cup chickpeas + 1 tbsp olive oil

commonMeals.name: Grilled fish with lemon and veg
commonMeals.portionGuidance: 1 palm fish + 2 cups veg + 1 tsp olive oil

restaurantMode: Choose grilled fish or chicken with a vegetable side.
Ask for olive oil and lemon dressing on the side.
Swap fries for roasted veg or a side salad.
Pick tomato-based pasta instead of creamy sauces.

swapRules.reason: Lower fried fat while keeping seafood.

swapRules.swapWith: Olive oil garlic pasta with veg

swapRules.reason: Smaller carb portion with more volume.
